definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: We were haled into the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 我們被強行拖進了洗漱間。

sentences.english: A pair of guards dragged a prisoner in through the tower's stone doorway.
sentences.chinese: 兩個守衛把一個囚犯拖進來，穿過塔樓的石梯入口。

sentences.english: She hauled her large box into the room.
sentences.chinese: 她把那隻大箱子拖進了房間。

sentences.english: Pull a sled into the mud, so we worse calamity.
sentences.chinese: 把雪橇拖進泥塘裏，害得我們糟了殃。

sentences.english: The terrorists dragged her into a dark room and duffed her up.
sentences.chinese: 那些恐怖分子把她拖進一間黑暗的房間毒打了一頓。

sentences.english: The tugboat tugged the freighter into the harbor.
sentences.chinese: 拖輪把貨船拖進海港了。

sentences.english: The fishermen hauled the fish into the boat.
They grab the immobilized Jack and drag him inside.
sentences.chinese: 他們抓住了不能動彈的傑克，把他拖進了門裏。

sentences.english: The Wizard buys the opera tickets; I drag him to the odd Chinese culture events.
sentences.chinese: 韋澤買了歌劇票，我把他拖進了奇異的中國文化。

sentences.english: He part say, part hard drag along beard spring into the front door of guest house.
sentences.chinese: 他一邊說着，一邊就硬把胡春拖進了招待所的大門。

sentences.english: Hale drags Leticia into the woods and forces her to the ground.
sentences.chinese: Hale將她拖進了樹林，扔在地上。

sentences.english: She tugged the suitcase into her room.
sentences.chinese: 她把手提箱拖進房間裏。

sentences.english: The mice pulled the carriage into the barn.
sentences.chinese: 於是小老鼠將車拖進牲口棚。

sentences.english: My lovely cat pulled in a basket full of fish last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我那可愛的小貓拖進一隻裝滿魚的籃子。

sentences.english: The yard out of the dark skin of the elderly, will land him into the room.
sentences.chinese: 院子裏走出皮膚黝黑的老人，將他拖進土房裏。

sentences.english: Five years later, many more have been drawn into Rinngo Sheena's world.
sentences.chinese: 五年過去，更多的人被拖進了椎名林檎的世界。
